code: import React from'react';import{Link,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import styles from'../headerpgstyles.module.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const HeaderLinks=()=>{const location=useLocation();const links=[{path:'/main',label:'მთავარი'},{path:'/collections/offers',label:'შეთავაზებები'},{path:'/collections',label:'კოლექცია'},{path:'/madebyu',label:'შექმენი შენით'},{path:'/contact',label:'კონტაქტი'},{path:'/aboutus',label:'ჩვენ შესახებ'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.pageslinks,children:links.map(_ref=>{let{path,label}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{className:`${styles.link} ${location.pathname===path?styles.activeLink:''}`,to:path,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:styles.linksstyle,children:label})},path);})});};export default HeaderLinks;
